segments.text: I see the woman is so focused on drying that plate, it's almost comical.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water overflowing and creating a huge puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, taking cookies without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad seeing the boy risking a fall just to get some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is eagerly waiting for her turn, completely ignoring the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how the woman doesn't notice any of this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the open window and calm garden add to the contrast of the scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, and it makes me fearful for the boy's safety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and sees what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit disgusting to see the water spreading all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR
